bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ RIB Tech, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, aero seat tube, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: D6 high modulus carbon thin seat stays, oversized ETC chainstay, forged alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ RIB Tech, tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Tiagra STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Alex A-CLASS R3.0 alloy clincher wheelset, 700c
Oval 300 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
